name: Darkest Dice
description:
A dice game in a dark cave with a mysterious figure... What could go wrong? 

Nine levels of EPIC dice battles! 

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam solo.

Would not have been able to make it without these great assets: 
GameDevHQ's Filebase
UX Flat Icons [Free]
HQ Hats Pack (25 in 1)
Clean Flat Icons
Epic Toon FX
Highlight Plus
3D Fire and Explosions
Mega Animations Pack    
Magic Sci-Fi Sword Sounds
UPGEN Lighting URP
Werewolf Animset

Artlist Audio:
Aquarium - Wolf Samuels
Chained - Frank Schlimbach
Foreboding - Lux Inspira 
Forest Tales - Sebastian Pangal
Fury - Ardie Son
Into the Transcendence - Tilman Sillescu
The Heir - Emmanuel Jacob
Two - Jameson Nathan Jones
Ambiance, horror, Eerie, evolving - Phil Michalski
Horrid shadow, mix of layers, composition, horror elements - Lukas Tvrdon
